trans-unit.source: colspan

The permalink is an unique url for this post (Sometimes called guid or uuid). The permalink is generated automatically from insert tag pattern by default (See default post pattern in the settings). But it's also possible to enter any path manually.

There are some restrictions for valid urls (see RFC 3986)!

Allowed characters for a valid url are Alphanumeric characters as well as the special characters $-_.+!*()/

These insert tags can be used to insert post attributes into the permalink automatically:
{{alias}}
Will be replaced with the post name
{{author}}
Will be replaced with the author of the post
{{parent}}
Will be replaced with the path from the page under which the archive is located
{{date}}
Will be replaced with the date (The date format from the root page or the settings will be used)
{{year}}
Will be replaced with the year of the date
{{month}}
Will be replaced with the month of the date
{{day}}
Will be replaced with the day of the date
{{time}}
Will be replaced with the time (The time format from the root page or the settings will be used)
{{location}}
Will be replaced with the location
{{latlong}}
Will be replaced with the latitude and longitude
{{category}}
Will be replaced with the category
{{language}}
Will be replaced with the root language
